item.title: InfoSec 2017: 'One disaster away from governments doing something' on IoT - Naked Security - IoT Newsletter
item.description:
InfoSec 2017: 'One disaster away from governments doing something' on IoT - Naked Security - IoT Newsletter

Regulation is coming to the world of Internet of Things (IoT), according to security expert Bruce Schneier, who used his keynote at Infosec 2017 to warn delegates of the dangers of inaction. "Regulation is coming for us", he told the audience, adding: Governments are going to get involved, regardless.

item.title: Blockchain Technology Summit: Across the industries - Blockchain Unleashed: IBM Blockchain Blog
item.description:
Blockchain Technology Summit: Across the industries - Blockchain Unleashed: IBM Blockchain Blog

This is the year of blockchain: business networks put into production around the world are on display at IBM Blockchain Technology Summit in Atlanta.

item.title: Over 8,600 Vulnerabilities Found in Pacemakers
item.description:
Over 8,600 Vulnerabilities Found in Pacemakers

" If you want to keep living, Pay a ransom, or die." This could happen, as researchers have found thousands of vulnerabilities in Pacemakers that hackers could exploit. Millions of people that rely on pacemakers to keep their hearts beating are at risk of software glitches and hackers, which could eventually take their lives.

item.title: Udacity Talks Recent Episodes
item.description:
Udacity Talks Recent Episodes

Engage directly with Udacity Talks speakers who have specializations in a broad range of technology fields.

item.title: IBM turns to artificial intelligence to solve poverty, hunger, and illiteracy
item.description:
IBM turns to artificial intelligence to solve poverty, hunger, and illiteracy

IBM is channeling its science and tech expertise into tackling some of the world's biggest problems. On Wednesday, the tech giant announced the launch of Science for Social Good, a new program that partners IBM researchers with postdoctoral academic fellows and nonprofits to take on societal issues through data.

item.title: Udacity and the Liam's Life Foundation: A New Scholarship Program Begins | Udacity
item.description:
Udacity and the Liam's Life Foundation: A New Scholarship Program Begins | Udacity

We're excited to announce the start of a new scholarship program designed to provide learning opportunities for recipients to make the world a better and safer place for everyone. In the case of this very special scholarship, we also have the opportunity to honor the great work of our partner, .

item.title: Intel® Nervana™ AI Academy | Intel® Software
item.description:
Intel® Nervana™ AI Academy | Intel® Software

Intel® Nervana™ AI Academy provides training in machine learning and deep learning, with associated frameworks, tools, and libraries. Join our events at a meetup or online.

item.title: ARM Education Media Online Courses and Textbooks
item.description:
ARM Education Media Online Courses and Textbooks

Back in October, we announced the launch of ARM Education Media - a subscription-based digital content hub offering interactive online courses and e-first textbooks. The aim of this hub is to help address the growing education/skills gap in engineering, by developing academically rigorous and highly interactive content that demonstrates and harnesses state-of-the-art technologies from the ARM ecosystem.

item.title: Robotics, AI And Cognitive Computing Are Changing Organizations Even Faster Than We Thought
item.description:
Robotics, AI And Cognitive Computing Are Changing Organizations Even Faster Than We Thought

The world of AI, robotics and cognitive computing are changing business even faster than we thought. JPMorgan Chase & Co now uses software to perform the mind-numbing job of interpreting commercial loans, reducing 360,000 hours of lawyer time each year. AI software can now identify leukemia in photos and X-rays, learning faster than technicians.

item.title: Updating Google Maps with Deep Learning and Street View
item.description:
Updating Google Maps with Deep Learning and Street View

Every day, Google Maps provides useful directions, real-time traffic information and information on businesses to millions of people. In order to provide the best experience for our users, this information has to constantly mirror an ever-changing world.
